title: Expert-Oriented Science Learning Motivation Enhancement Course Using Fully Immersive Virtual Reality (FIVR)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Scientific Theories and Domain-Specific Professional Knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical application skills through project-based assessment utilizing FIVR content in a smartphone-based, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners actively engage in the scientific problem-solving process, achieving over 85% participation in the FIVR environment.
Learners improve their ability to apply scientific principles by over 30% through FIVR simulations.
Learners’ science learning self-efficacy increases by over 25% compared to pre-assessment by the end of the course.
Learners complete over 90% of practical solutions applying scientific reasoning in project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
